title: Victims (1982 - USA) low budget psychopathic killer horror
description:
This is not the TV movie of the same name and year.
___________________________________________________________________________________

Victims (1982 - USA)

alternative titles Paulie | Day of the Rapist | The Surfside Strangler

Drama / Horror / Thriller

director . . . Tony Vorno
starring . . . Lois Adams, Laura Borenstein, Ron Borenstein
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1764732/


Budget: $20,000

The horrific story of a psychopathic killer who, seeking help and unaware as to the roots of his compulsions, relives the traumas of his childhood and the unconscious memories of his past. The woman next door, lonely, her beauty in rapid decline, shatters with frightening consequences, the sexual taboos we reserve to protect our young. Shocked experiences of childhood merge with present day fantasies, compulsion is brutally unleashed. Call girl, secretary, housewife, hitchhikers, all fall victims as the barriers separating love and madness shatter.


Format: Matroska
Video : XviD, 416x320, 29.970 fps, 880 Kbps, 01h23m00s
Audio : MPEG Audio, 48000 Hz, stereo, 256 kbps

VHSRip, English audio, no subtitles
